revised_title: Arctic Climate Change Modeling and Projections
tldr: This article discusses the formulation and performance of a climate model developed by the Hadley Centre for Climate Prediction and Research at the Meteorological Office. The model simulates the Arctic climate and its sensitivity to increased concentrations of greenhouse gases. The authors compare the model's simulation of various Arctic climate features against observations and discuss its projections of future climate change in the region.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Climate Science
